name: labs-website

scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.image:build: npm run build && npm run test && with-package docker image build . -t pkg.imageRepo:latest
scripts.image:run: npm run image:clean && npm run image:runHelper
scripts.image:runHelper: with-package docker run --name pkg.imageName -d -p pkg.imagePort:3000 pkg.imageRepo
scripts.image:debug: npm run image:build && npm run image:run && sleep 1 && with-package open 'http://localhost:pkg.imagePort' && npm run image:taillogs
scripts.aws:login: AWS_REGION=$(with-package echo 'pkg.awsRegion' | tail -1 | awk '{print $NF}') && eval $(aws ecr get-login --no-include-email --region $AWS_REGION)
scripts.aws:publish: npm run aws:login && npm run image:publish && npm run aws:release

description: Future home of ExcellaLabs.com   #### [Production URL on Amazon S3](http://excellalabs.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com) #### [Development URL on Amazon S3](http://excellalabs.dev.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/)
